synopsis.text: Training to be a hero and defeat the Demon King, Raul Chaser's dreams are shattered when the Demon King is vanquished right before his Hero Exam. With no other options, Raul begrudgingly starts working at Magic Shop Leon, a small electronics store in the Royal Capital. His life takes a dramatic turn when a new part-time employee joins the team â€“ Fino Bloodstone, the daughter of the very Demon King he once aspired to defeat. Now, Raul must navigate the challenges of training his former enemy and managing the chaos she brings to his once mundane life. This unlikely duo's work comedy unfolds as they learn to work together and adapt to their new roles in a peaceful world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
